questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: In 10 years, I think that I stopped my studies and I will do job that I love.

I don't know imagine my futur because for this time, I don't know where am I. But I have a little bit idea because I like doing any thigs. I like riding horses and I am sure that in 10 years I ride horses. Because I riding horses for 12 years I riding horses. It's my passion and I love this.
However, I do a job for win my live. I think that in 10years I will worked in job I love. For the present I can doing in policy and I would worked in policy.
